classification_data.text: Obrando en mi calidad de Revisor Fiscal de NEWSAT S.A.S. NIT. 830.513.366-3 CERTIFICO QUE: He revisado los libros oficiales de contabilidad de la empresa NEWSAT S.A.S., los cuales se encuentran debidamente inscritos en la Cámara de Comercio de Bogotá. Para los efectos de esta certificación he revisado información que he considerado necesaria y he seguido los procedimientos establecidos por las Normas de Auditoria Generalmente Aceptadas en Colombia. La composición accionaria de la empresa al 29 de febrero del 2024 es la siguiente: CC/NIT NOMBRE DEL ACCIONISTA ACCIONISTAS NEWSAT S.A.S. SALDOS A FEB. 29 DE 2024 % No. DE ACCIONES VALOR NOMINAL 6386024 CARLOS ENRIQUE ROSERO CERON 148.000 $1.480.000.000,00 40% 301680 SHAI BERCOVICH 148.000 $1.480.000.000,00 40% 91499446 DIEGO ALEJANDRO SALAZAR VASQUEZ 74.000 $740.000.000,00 20% TOTALES 370.000 $3.700.000.000,00 100% La presente certificación se expide a solicitud de la empresa a los veinte (20) días del mes de marzo de 2024, con destino a entidades Gubernamentales y Financieras. Cordialmente, ROBERTO LONDOÑO OSORIO Revisor Fiscal T.P. 153999-T CALLE 98A N° 60 - 87 BARRIO ANDES - TELÉFONO +(571) 7456579 - BOGOTA D.C.

content.thinking: Let me analyze this document carefully: 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION**: The document appears to be a Spanish-language certification from a "Revisor Fiscal" (Fiscal Auditor) for a company called NEWSAT S.A.S. The document contains: - Company identification: NEWSAT S.A.S., with NIT (tax ID) 830.513.366-3 - Certification by the Fiscal Auditor that they've reviewed the accounting books - Statement that the company's books are properly registered with the Bogotá Chamber of Commerce - The shareholding composition as of February 29, 2024 - A detailed table with shareholder information including: * Names of shareholders (Carlos Enrique Rosero Ceron, Shai Bercovich, Diego Alejandro Salazar Vasquez) * Their ID numbers * Number of shares each owns * Nominal value of shares * Ownership percentages (40%, 40%, 20% respectively) - Total share information (370,000 shares worth 3.7 billion Colombian pesos) - Signature and details of Roberto Londoño Osorio, the Fiscal Auditor - Date of certification (March 20, 2024) - Statement that this certificate was issued for governmental and financial entities 2. **CATEGORY ANALYSIS**: Let's check against each relevant category: **CERL (Certificate of Legal Existence and Representation)**: - NO direct mention of "Certificado de Existencia y Representación Legal" - NO comprehensive corporate history - NO detailed corporate governance structure - Not issued by Chamber of Commerce but by a Fiscal Auditor - MISSING: Multiple corporate roles, business object, legal history **ACC (Shareholder Structure)**: - PRESENT: Shareholder terminology ("composición accionaria", "accionistas") - PRESENT: Ownership percentages clearly shown (40%, 40%, 20%) - PRESENT: Number of shares and nominal values for each shareholder - PRESENT: List of shareholders with names and ID numbers - PRESENT: Certification by authorized figure (Fiscal Auditor) - PRESENT: Clear ownership structure focus - PRESENT: The document is explicitly a certification of shareholding structure **RUT/RUB**: - NO DIAN involvement - NO tax registration details - NO beneficial ownership transparency focus - NO regulatory compliance terminology This document clearly fits the ACC (Shareholder Structure) category. It is specifically a certification of the shareholding structure of NEWSAT S.A.S., issued by the company's Fiscal Auditor. It contains precise information about the ownership percentages, shares, and shareholding distribution, which are the key indicators for the ACC category. The extracted text is as follows: ``` Obrando en mi calidad de Revisor Fiscal de NEWSAT S.A.S. Para los efectos de esta certificación he revisado información que he considerado necesaria y he seguido los procedimientos establecidos por las Normas de Auditoria Generalmente Aceptadas en Colombia.
